sentences.english: 'The character is very much different from what audiences have seen before, ' he continued.
sentences.chinese: 他接着說，這個角色和觀衆以前看到的葉問非常不同。

sentences.english: The film YeWen on Friday at New Time Cinema.
sentences.chinese: 電影《葉問》星期五在新時代電影院上演。

sentences.english: " What was she like, your wife ? " said Julia.
After that encounter, Yip Man continued to learn from Leung Bik.
sentences.chinese: 經過這次遭遇以後，葉問又跟着梁壁學習武術。

sentences.english: Likewise the first IP Man was a typical action martial arts classic.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的《葉問》也是一個經典的動作電影。

sentences.english: His students included a young Bruce Lee.
sentences.chinese: 葉問的弟子之一就是年輕時代的李小龍。
